dublin_core.dcvalue: Telemedicine has become commonplace since the creation of the European Center of Telemedicine and dermatology was a pioneering discipline in this new technology The Division of Dermatology is now involved at three different levels The Midi Pyr n es regional network which allows doctors in the private and public sectors to seek expert advice in real time from university hospital specialists He Division of Dermatology pioneered telemedicine sessions devoted to file review histological clinical diagnosis and information exchanges among subspecialists in dermatology Both French and foreign specialists attend these sessions Teaching particularly for students and private practitioners Telemedicine has clear benefits for patients doctors and society as a whole The private and hospital community of the Midi Pyr n es region is constantly seeking to improve its health services and ensures that all new approaches are subject to strict quality controls
